attributes.action: all news should be reported from a neutral point of view without media biase
attributes.additional_details: Too many media outlets are reporting issues as they see them or would like to see them. This is assisting in causing unrest amongst the public with different groups responding differently depending on which media viewpoint they have seen. Misleading by viewing the news from one point alone is bad for both the public and the media.
attributes.background: Ensure that news is reported from a neutral viewpoint with no media biase. Biased views from left or right could inflame the public, neutrality should be observed at all times.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300700
